diagram_logic_form: The length of the line $CX$ is $2x + 1$ units.
The length of the line $BC$ is $7$ units.
The length of the line $DX$ is $15$ units.
The length of the line $BD$ is $x$ units.
Point $B$ lies on the line connecting $C$ and $D$.
The measure of angle $CXB$ is equal to the measure of angle $BXD$.
line_instances: There are lines $BC$, $BD$, and $CD$ that form a triangle $BCD$.
There are lines $BX$, $CX$, and $DX$ that form a triangle $BCD$.
